title: 2BR/1 Bath/Kitchen with stainless steep appliance, Balcony/ParkingSpot
posting_body: 2 beds/1 bath on the top floor of a 3 unit building.
Large eat-in kitchen with stainless steel appliances, wood countertop with a big deck adjoining the kitchen.
Refinished hardwood floors throughout the apartment.
Bedroom accommodate queen beds with room to spare for an office/dresser
Apartment available to rent September 1st, Rent includes parking spot for one car and free shared laundry in basement for personal use.
Centrally located in Noble Square with blocks away from Blue Line station(both Division and Chicago), Steps away from Expressway.
You're only a few steps away from Chicago Ave., near Forbidden Root, Beauty Bar, Flo, and numerous vintage stores and coffee shops.
Express is around the cornere and the blue line Division stop is a few blocks away, making it very convenient to get around the city.
Wicker Park, Ukrainian Village, Bucktown are all close enough to walk or Uber to, as well as Pilsen and Fulton Market.
